Name: Rosa Del Carmen
description: Rosa is 46 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and two children. Together with her husband she makes a living planting corn and beans. Rosa also works on a coffee plantation seeding and fertilizing the plants. The most important thing for her is the security of her family so she wants to build  a wall around the perimeter of her house. Rosa is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of wire mesh and cement posts in order to safeguard her few possessions and her family.
